ffffs004 Silver Surfboard
Rarity: Super Rare

Silver Surfboard
EQUIP: Any. UNEQUIP: Drop. EFFECT: [Wing symbol] , Hypersonic Speed. When this character uses Hypersonic Speed, if it doesn't have the Cosmic keyword, after resolutions roll a d6. 1-2: Give this character an action token.
10 Points
Figure Errata
OLD: EQUIP: Any. UNEQUIP: Drop. EFFECT: [Flight symbol], Hypersonic Speed. // When an equipped character without the Cosmic keyword uses Hypersonic Speed, after resolutions roll a d6. 1-2: Give that character an action token. Heavy Object.

[Quote] So how does this even work with the new rules? There's no pushing damage so....if you roll a 1-2 you just, do nothing?[/Quote] It depends on when the character uses HSS, if the character had no action tokens then he'd get one token for using HSS as normal and then a second token for failing the roll. The character with one token has the advantage of not being able to receive the token that's applied with a failed roll. Either way being target practice for two turns SUCKS
